madonna is my all time favorite.

i listen to blues and jazz.
my favorite books are the harry potter books.

I'd rather sleep in, but I do love spending time with my family.

content.text: Hello, I'm a big fan of Madonna! What's your favorite song by her?
Me too! My favorite is Who's That Girl. What do you like about her music?
I love her energy and her voice is amazing. What do you do for fun?
I love to ski and I also enjoy listening to blues and jazz. What about you?
I love to bake and I also have a pug named Corky. He's my best friend.
Pugs are so cute! I love dogs. I have two cats, but I would love to have a dog too.
I love taking Corky to the dog park. He loves to play fetch and run around.
That sounds like a lot of fun. I would love to have a dog, but I don't think I have the time to take care of one right now.
I understand. Dogs are a lot of work. I'm lucky that I have a lot of time for Corky.
It sounds like you have a great dog. I'm glad you're able to give him a good home.
